setwd("/Users/yangjianxia/Desktop/npj.code/Fig3fghijklmnopqrs")
rm(list=ls())
library(circlize)
###NN00
mat<-read.csv("NN00.csv",row.names = 1,header = T)
head(mat)
circos.clear()
grid.col = c(A1 = "#00ff7f", A2 = "#ffa54f", A3 = "#63b8ff",A4 = "#ffe1ff",
             A5 = "#836fff", A6 = "#ff0000", A7 = "#ee82ee", A8 = "#cd853f",
             A9 = "#40e0d0", A10 = "#ff6347",
             B1 = "#00ff7f", B2 = "#ffa54f", B3 = "#63b8ff",B4 = "#ffe1ff",
             B5 = "#836fff", B6 = "#ff0000", B7 = "#ee82ee", B8 = "#cd853f",
             B9 = "#40e0d0", B10 = "#ff6347")
circos.par(gap.after = c("A1" = 6, "A2" = 6, "A3" = 6, "A4" = 6, "A5" = 6,
                         "A6" = 6, "A7" = 6, "A8" = 6, "A9" = 6,"A10" = 6,
                         "B1" = 6,"B2" = 6, "B3" = 6, "B4" = 6, "B5" = 6,
                         "B6" = 6,"B7" = 6, "B8" = 6, "B9" = 6, "B10" = 6))
pdf(file="NN00.pdf",width = 4,height = 4,pointsize = 13)
chordDiagram(mat, order = c("A1", "A2", "A3", "A4", 
                            "A5", "A6", "A7", "A8","A9","A10",
                            "B1", "B2", "B3", "B4", "B5", "B6",
                            "B7", "B8","B9","B10"),grid.col = grid.col,
             transparency = 0)
title(main=expression(N[cess]*'N'*'0'*':'~'2'*'2'*'6'~'H'*'G'*'T'*'s'))
dev.off()
